tvdb: After seeing the photo of Ian and Lucy in bed, Eve realizes Kevin already knows about their affair.  Vowing to make Ian pay, Eve steals truth serum from the hospital, just as Ian tells Lucy he feels he and Eve are close to reconciling.  After Jack escapes from the hospital, Alison finds him in the woods and he tells her he encountered pure evil.
